title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, May 2, 2022
description: "You know more than you think you do." The parenting advice of the baby boomer generation came from Dr. Benjamin Spock, born on this day in 1903.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "You know more than you think you do." The parenting advice of the baby boomer generation came from Dr. Benjamin Spock, born on this day in 1903.
